snippet: Three trusted aides to the North Korean leader Kim Jong-un arrived in South Korea on Saturday to attend the closing ceremony of the Asian Games in a highly unusual trip.
abstract: Three trusted aides to North Korean leader Kim Jong-un arrive in South Korea to attend closing ceremony of Asian Games in a highly unusual trip that might signal easing tensions between countries.
lead_paragraph: Three trusted aides to the North Korean leader Kim Jong-un arrived in South Korea on Saturday to attend the closing ceremony of the Asian Games in a highly unusual trip.

headline.main: In Unusual Trip, North Korean Aides Attend Games in South
headline.print_headline: N. Korea Shows at Games in South
